OF
THE ASSOCIATION OF COLLEGE AND UNIVERSITY BROADCASTING STATIONS
(and a special request mailing list)
At the annual meeting of the Association of College and University Broadcasting
Stations, Columbus, Ohio, on June 7, 1932, the report of the Nominating Committee
was considered by the members present, and from their recommendations the following
officers were elected for the coming yeari
